survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of networking opportunities at professional conferences and identify areas for improvement to enhance attendee experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities provided at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better response granularity.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons; ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities provided at the conference?

questions.question_text: Which of the following networking formats did you participate in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes; enable text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following networking formats did you participate in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance networking opportunities at future conferences?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Text input field; allow for long-form responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance networking opportunities at future conferences?

questions.question_text: How many meaningful connections did you make at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use predefined ranges for easier analysis.

script.question_text: How many meaningful connections did you make at the conference?
